msubsection.title: update
msubsection.p: Bring changes from the repository into the working copy. If no revision given, bring working copy up-to-date with HEAD rev. Else synchronize working copy to revision.

attribute.name: recurse
attribute.doc: Set to "false" to operate on a single directory only (applies only if dir has been set).

attribute.name: revision
attribute.doc:
Possible values are:
a date with the format as specified in dateFormatter attribute
a revision number
HEAD, BASE, COMMITED or PREV

ul.li:
fileset
Filesets are used to select sets of files to update.
